GeneDef.label: bioreactor
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can convert their own nutrition and blood into raw radioactive energy.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Gives the hemogen conversion ability if hemogenic.
Reaching 120% charge will start causing radiation loss as the body starts to expel radiation before it becomes harmful to the radiomancer.
While dispelling energy this way, nearby non-radiomancer pawns have a risk of developing carcinoma.
Using Solar Recharging makes this a lot easier to automatically manage due to the passive regen.

GeneDef.label: infused muscles
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene gain a buff when they remain at maximum radiation for an extended period of time. This buff enhances their physical strength, allowing them to deal more in melee combat and allowing them to carry more with them.

GeneDef.label: energized neurons
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene gain a buff when they remain at maximum radiation for an extended period of time. This buff enhances their mental capabilities, allowing them to learn new things faster.

GeneDef.label: energy armor
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene gain a buff when they remain at maximum radiation for an extended period of time. This buff comes in the form of an armor coating their body that both protects the radiomancer and causes nearby hostile pawns to take damage whenever the radiomancer is hit. This will not affect pawns Rimworld doesn't recognize as hostile to the radiomancer.

GeneDef.label: condense radiation
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can condense massive amounts of radioactive energy within their body and output it as a radiation orb. This orb can be absorbed by a radiomancer at a later point to regain most of the energy expended in its creation.\n\nNote that while the orb does not cause side effects to other pawns near it, it can create extremely dangerous explosions if damaged.

GeneDef.label: solar recharging
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene gain large amounts of energy by standing in sources of really bright light, like the sun or sun lamps.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Radiation recharge only active while standing in sunlight, or with the aid of artificial sources of 60%+ light.
Light created from sun lamps, the star rift created by "open rift to star", the star created from "miniature sun", and any other source that creates over 60% light level activate this ability.

GeneDef.label: solar regeneration
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene quickly heal while in sunlight, natural or artificial, and if they remain in sunlight for an entire, unbroken hour they can even regrow parts.

GeneDef.label: undying sun
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene are exceptionally difficult to kill while in sunlight, even if said sunlight is artificial. Their body uses sunlight to reinforce their skin, destroy anything internally that is actively causing them harm, and stops the pawn from suffering from bloodloss.
